mapper.select: SELECT NAME as name , description as description , place as place , typeCd as typeCd , promotion as promotion , TO_BASE64(img) as imgBase64 FROM product;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(NAME, DESCRIPTION, PLACE, TYPECD, PROMOTION, IMG) VALUES(#{name}, #{description}, #{place}, #{typeCd}, #{promotion}, CONVERT(#{imgBase64}, BINARY))
